Difference between rise in women's and men's unemployment during U.S. recessions
Note: Negative values indicate men experienced higher unemployment. Positive values indicate women experienced higher unemployment.
kiersten schmidt/grow This Time It’s Different: The Role of Women’s Employment in a Pandemic Recession, Northwestern University
